member.name: T:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog
member.summary: Prompts the user to choose a font from among those installed on the local computer.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: E:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Apply
member.summary: Occurs when the user clicks the Apply button in the font dialog box.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.AllowScriptChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can change the character set specified in the Script combo box to display a character set other than the one currently displayed.
member.value: true if the user can change the character set specified in the Script combo box; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.AllowSimulations
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box allows graphics device interface (GDI) font simulations.
member.value: true if font simulations are allowed; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.AllowVectorFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box allows vector font selections.
member.value: true if vector fonts are allowed; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.AllowVerticalFonts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays both vertical and horizontal fonts or only horizontal fonts.
member.value: true if both vertical and horizontal fonts are allowed; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected font color.
member.value: The color of the selected font. The default value is Black.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.FixedPitchOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box allows only the selection of fixed-pitch fonts.
member.value: true if only fixed-pitch fonts can be selected; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected font.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.FontMustExist
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box specifies an error condition if the user attempts to select a font or style that does not exist.
member.value: true if the dialog box specifies an error condition when the user tries to select a font or style that does not exist; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MaxSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum point size a user can select.
member.value: The maximum point size a user can select. The default is 0.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.MinSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum point size a user can select.
member.value: The minimum point size a user can select. The default is 0.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ScriptsOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box allows selection of fonts for all non-OEM and Symbol character sets, as well as the ANSI character set.
member.value: true if selection of fonts for all non-OEM and Symbol character sets, as well as the ANSI character set, is allowed; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowApply
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box contains an Apply button.
member.value: true if the dialog box contains an Apply button; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays the color choice.
member.value: true if the dialog box displays the color choice; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowEffects
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box contains controls that allow the user to specify strikethrough, underline, and text color options.
member.value: true if the dialog box contains controls to set strikethrough, underline, and text color options; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShowHelp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays a Help button.
member.value: true if the dialog box displays a Help button; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.Reset
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, resets the properties of a common dialog box to their default values.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ToString
member.summary: Retrieves a string that includes the name of the current font selected in the dialog box.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.HookProc(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Defines the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.
member.returns: A zero value if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.
member.param: The handle to the dialog box window.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.OnApply(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.RunDialog(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, specifies a common dialog box.
member.returns: true if the dialog box was successfully run; otherwise, false.
member.param: A value that represents the window handle of the owner window for the common dialog box.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.GetFlags
member.summary: Gets the flags to apply to the CHOOSEFONT structure

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ResetFont
member.summary: Resets the font.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.ShouldSerializeFont
member.summary: Determine if we should serialize font.
member.returns: true if it succeeds, false if it fails.

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.UpdateColor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the color

member.name: M:Cyotek.Windows.Forms.FontDialog.UpdateFont(Cyotek.Windows.Forms.NativeMethods.LOGFONT)
member.summary: Updates the font described by the specified LOGFONT structure
